messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: POLICE REPORT: #PD-4732-OP DATE: 04/21/23  A burglary was reported at Bay Side Mall at around 1:15 AM. Security Officer Paul M. N. King alerted the police after observing suspicious activity via CCTV. RESPONDENTS: (A) PATROL: Officer O. P. Q. Lee and Officer R. S. T. Hughes. (B) K-9 UNIT: Deputy U. V. W. Evans with K-9 Max. (C) DETECTIVE UNIT: Det. X. Y. Z. Baker. CRITICAL - EVIDENCE COLLECTION & THEFT PREVENTION MEASURE REVIEW.  CONNECTION TO: #PD-4720-OP. A string of burglaries has been noted in the area over the last month. NOTE: Observations from Ms. Gina Lopez (Mall Manager) and Mr. Alan Perry (Security Consultant) are included in ATTACHMENT A. FORWARD DETAILS TO: CHIEF OF POLICE & THEFT PREVENTION UNIT.  Officer Lee was first on the scene, followed closely by Officer Hughes. Deputy Evans led a perimeter check with K-9 Max, while Detective Baker assessed the scene for potential leads. The unknown assailant left behind a tool (possibly a crowbar) which has been sent for fingerprint analysis.  DISPATCHED TO: DETECTIVE UNIT & EVIDENCE COLLECTION UNIT - DET. Baker, Officer Lee, Officer Hughes, Deputy Evans. CASE LEADS: [1] Potential Fingerprint on Tool [2] CCTV Footage [3] Eye Witness Account [4] K-9 “Max” Tracking Details. SCENE OF CRIME: BAY SIDE MALL, 23 Harbor Street, San Francisco, California, 94016. BREAK-IN 1:15 - REPORTED: Security Officer King, Officers Lee and Hughes, Det. Baker, Deputy Evans ON SCENE. Case Logged.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Security Officer Paul M. N. King  
Officer Context: Security Officer Paul M. N. King alerted the police after observing suspicious activity via CCTV.  
Officer Role: Security Officer 

Officer Name: Officer O. P. Q. Lee  
Officer Context: Officer O. P. Q. Lee and Officer R. S. T. Hughes were respondents to the incident.  
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Officer R. S. T. Hughes  
Officer Context: Officer O. P. Q. Lee and Officer R. S. T. Hughes were respondents to the incident.  
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Deputy U. V. W. Evans  
Officer Context: Deputy U. V. W. Evans led a perimeter check with K-9 "Max".  
Officer Role: Deputy 

Officer Name: Det. X. Y. Z. Baker  
Officer Context: Detective Baker assessed the scene for potential leads.  
Officer Role: Detective
